alert.note: Alert for Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 7:28PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Wilson County through 800 PM CDT... At 728 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lebanon, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lebanon, Watertown, Cedars Of Lebanon State Park, and Gladeville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 234 and 249. Interstate 840 between mile markers 69 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
